title: New irelia is bad.
body:
Stop reworking good champs into anime champs.

Swain and now Irelia

stop

What you call questionable others call logical. As it stands irelia is just a stat check champ which a stun that lacks game play clarity.  Also not sure how you can call that good by any means and on top of that they arenâ€™t turning champs into â€œ anime champsâ€ as u call it. Itâ€™s called fantasy nothing in league is possible. Hell the only really anime is the star guardian skins referencing sailor moon and super galaxy skins referencing gurren lagann and a couple of smaller ones like neon vi recall is a reference to Franky from one piece and Ezreal's dance is from Haruhi (Hare Hare Yukai).

LOOK AT THIS WEEB NONSENSE
They even use a script to post their trailer. I guess they allow scripting in the game? lul
the champ has been the same since release (skill wise), I'm pretty sure they need reworks to keep the game as fresh as possible whether you like it or not

Basing a 'Japanese' character off an incredibly popular Japanese cultural style?

 **Outrageous!** 

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} 
Next you'll be telling me that the Shuriman characters were based off 
Egyptian cultural icons...
